text:
I wonder if I've passed through this area before... Oh, look,
there's an interesting house with a unique roof over there.

Really~! There are so many discoveries
to be made when you go for walks every day.

Haha, Your work and discoveries seem
to make your days quite fulfilling.
By the way, is there anything troubling you at work?

Because you listen to me every day like this, Producer-san,
everything is going really smoothly~!

But, are you sure you're okay, Producer-san?
You're always accompanying me on walks...
Well, it's for your sake, Amana.
It's all part of the job.
